channel.title: Kr1plcraft | new hardcore pvp server
channel.description:
Kr1pLcraft | Hardcore PvP
Kr1plcraft is a brand new dedicated 24/7 hardcore pvp server. Kr1pLcraft supports many plugins including: AutoAnnouncer, BOSeconomy, CombatTag, Factions, Herospawn, PersmissionsEX and Regios. This server is hardcore so abuse is accepted (racism is not permitted). Kr1pLcraft includes MySQL support and a donation system to achieve ranks. Kr1pLcraft includes 2 worlds, 1 being the PvP / Factions world and the other being a grief-free Architect world that donaters can achieve access to. Ip: 176.31.239.18:25579
Sincerely, XxXjAwDsTaXxX
PS. Kr1pLcraft is still in production so expect more in the near future
